alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 12:40PM CDT until March 29 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. .Law Enforcement reported no flow over the spillway yesterday and the current flow is approximately 3 feet over the spillway as of noon Saturday. Releases from Lake Bronson have decreased over the last few days and forecast stage is based on channel flows and the estimated stage based on Sheriff`s observation of 804.0 at around 12 pm. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 804.5 feet, Backup at Reach 2 Dike, cemetery road at 6th St S. Shut storm valve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Stages are estimated based on Sheriff`s observation of 804.0 at around 12 pm. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Monday morning and continue falling to 797.7 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
